# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title

* Sir Wilfred Grenfell Drydocking and Refit

## Procurement ID

* WS4606244983

## Solicitation Type

* Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

## Brief Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the dry docking and refit of the NGCC Sir Wilfred Grenfell, a water transport vessel.

## Key Details

* **Contract Period**: The expected start date of the contract is June 26, 2024, with no end date specified.
* **Trade Agreements**: This contract is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* **Regions of Delivery**: The work must be completed in British Columbia, Canada.
* **Contracting Entity**: The PSPC (Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux, SPAC in French) is the contracting entity for this project.
* **End User**: The Canadian Coast Guard will be the end user of the services provided.
* **Contact Information**: Please contact Patrick Wass at patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for additional information.

## Technical Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide water transport vessel maintenance and repair services, including dry docking and refit. The work must meet the client's specifications and be completed within the agreed-upon timeframe.

## Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is July 10, 2024, at 14:00:00.

**Quick Reference**
\* Project Title: Sir Wilfred Grenfell Drydocking and Refit
\* Solicitation Number: WS4606244983
\* Tender Closing Date: July 10, 2024, at 14:00:00

For more information, please contact Patrick Wass at patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  Please note that inquiries and correspondence should be made in writing, and will not necessarily result in a response. This is a government tender from a Job posting site. All inquiries or requests for clarification must be submitted through the relevant authorities.  If you would like to respond to this solicitation, please submit your bid in writing by the closing date.  Bidders must demonstrate the ability to perform the work and meet the client's requirements.  The contract award will be made to the lowest priced bid, which meets the minimum requirements.  Please ensure all workers on the project meet all applicable labor
